body_html:
Hmm what are the files that have the same file names and cause the conflicts? I can't see them.

Great stuff @Jorghi12 looking forward to more simplifications! Just FYI I think CUDA 9 also treats half as a pretty much first-class type, but we can't rely on that if we want to support CUDA 8.

body:
Hmm what are the files that have the same file names and cause the conflicts? I can't see them.

Great stuff @Jorghi12 looking forward to more simplifications! Just FYI I think CUDA 9 also treats half as a pretty much first-class type, but we can't rely on that if we want to support CUDA 8.
